proc.meminfo.active.name: proc.meminfo.active
proc.meminfo.active.definition: 活跃使用中的高速缓冲存储器页面文件大小

proc.meminfo.dirty.name: proc.meminfo.dirty
proc.meminfo.dirty.definition: 等待被写回到磁盘的内存大小

proc.meminfo.memavailable.name: proc.meminfo.memavailable
proc.meminfo.memavailable.definition: An estimate of how much memory is available for starting new applications, without swapping. Calculated from MemFree, SReclaimable, the size of the file LRU lists, and the low watermarks in each zone. The estimate takes into account that the system needs some page cache to function well, and that not all reclaimable slab will be reclaimable, due to items being in use. The impact of those factors will vary from system to system.

proc.net.dropped.in.name: proc.net.dropped.in
proc.net.dropped.in.definition: The total number of packets dropped by the device driver.

proc.net.dropped.out.name: proc.net.dropped.out
proc.net.dropped.out.definition: The total number of packets dropped by the device driver.

proc.net.errs.in.name: proc.net.errs.in
proc.net.errs.in.definition: The total number of receive errors detected by the device driver.

proc.net.errs.out.name: proc.net.errs.out
proc.net.errs.out.definition: The total number of transmit errors detected by the device driver.

proc.net.packets.in.name: proc.net.packets.in
proc.net.packets.in.definition: The total number of packets of data received by the interface

proc.net.packets.out.name: proc.net.packets.out
proc.net.packets.out.definition: The total number of packets of data transmitted by the interface

proc.kernel.entropy_avail.name: proc.kernel.entropy_avail
proc.kernel.entropy_avail.definition: 存储了熵池现在的大小

proc.meminfo.anonhugepages.name: proc.meminfo.anonhugepages
proc.meminfo.anonhugepages.definition: 未映射的大页面的大小

proc.meminfo.cached.name: proc.meminfo.cached
proc.meminfo.cached.definition: 高速缓冲存储器使用的大小

proc.meminfo.commitlimit.name: proc.meminfo.commitlimit
proc.meminfo.commitlimit.definition: 指当前可以分配给程序使用的虚拟内存

proc.meminfo.committed_as.name: proc.meminfo.committed_as
proc.meminfo.committed_as.definition: 指当前已分配给程序使用的总虚拟内存

proc.meminfo.directmap1g.name: proc.meminfo.directmap1g
proc.meminfo.directmap1g.definition: The amount of memory being mapped to hugepages (1G in size)

proc.meminfo.directmap2m.name: proc.meminfo.directmap2m
proc.meminfo.directmap2m.definition: The amount of memory being mapped to hugepages (2MB in size)

proc.meminfo.directmap4k.name: proc.meminfo.directmap4k
proc.meminfo.directmap4k.definition: The amount of memory being mapped to standard 4k pages

proc.meminfo.hardwarecorrupted.name: proc.meminfo.hardwarecorrupted
proc.meminfo.hardwarecorrupted.definition: show the amount of memory in `poisoned pages`

proc.meminfo.inactive.name: proc.meminfo.inactive
proc.meminfo.inactive.definition: 不经常使用的高速缓冲存储器页面文件大小

proc.meminfo.kernelstack.name: proc.meminfo.kernelstack
proc.meminfo.kernelstack.definition: The memory the kernel stack uses. This is not reclaimable.

proc.meminfo.mapped.name: proc.meminfo.mapped
proc.meminfo.mapped.definition: 设备和文件映射的大小

proc.meminfo.mlocked.name: proc.meminfo.mlocked
proc.meminfo.mlocked.definition: Pages locked to memory using the mlock() system call. Mlocked pages are also Unevictable.

proc.meminfo.pagetables.name: proc.meminfo.pagetables
proc.meminfo.pagetables.definition: 管理内存分页的索引表的大小

proc.meminfo.shmem.name: proc.meminfo.shmem
proc.meminfo.shmem.definition: Total used shared memory (shared between several processes, thus including RAM disks, SYS-V-IPC and BSD like SHMEM)

proc.meminfo.slab.name: proc.meminfo.slab
proc.meminfo.slab.definition: 内核数据结构缓存的大小，可减少申请和释放内存带来的消耗

proc.meminfo.swapcached.name: proc.meminfo.swapcached
proc.meminfo.swapcached.definition: 被高速缓冲存储用的交换空间大小

proc.meminfo.unevictable.name: proc.meminfo.unevictable
proc.meminfo.unevictable.definition: Unevictable pages can't be swapped out for a variety of reasons

proc.meminfo.vmallocchunk.name: proc.meminfo.vmallocchunk
proc.meminfo.vmallocchunk.definition: largest contigious block of vmalloc area which is free

proc.meminfo.vmallocused.name: proc.meminfo.vmallocused
proc.meminfo.vmallocused.definition: 已经被使用的虚拟内存大小

proc.meminfo.writeback.name: proc.meminfo.writeback
proc.meminfo.writeback.definition: 正在被写回到磁盘的内存大小

proc.meminfo.writebacktmp.name: proc.meminfo.writebacktmp
proc.meminfo.writebacktmp.definition: Memory used by FUSE for temporary writeback buffers

proc.net.carrier.errs.out.name: proc.net.carrier.errs.out
proc.net.carrier.errs.out.definition: The number of carrier losses detected by the device driver

proc.net.collisions.out.name: proc.net.collisions.out
proc.net.collisions.out.definition: The number of collisions detected on the interface

proc.net.compressed.in.name: proc.net.compressed.in
proc.net.compressed.in.definition: The number of compressed packets received by the device driver.

proc.net.compressed.out.name: proc.net.compressed.out
proc.net.compressed.out.definition: The number of compressed packets transmitted by the device driver.

proc.net.fifo.errs.in.name: proc.net.fifo.errs.in
proc.net.fifo.errs.in.definition: The number of FIFO buffer errors

proc.net.fifo.errs.out.name: proc.net.fifo.errs.out
proc.net.fifo.errs.out.definition: The number of FIFO buffer errors

proc.net.frame.errs.in.name: proc.net.frame.errs.in
proc.net.frame.errs.in.definition: The number of packet framing errors

proc.net.multicast.in.name: proc.net.multicast.in
proc.net.multicast.in.definition: The number of packet framing errors

proc.stat.intr.name: proc.stat.intr
proc.stat.intr.definition: 自系统启动以来，发生的所有的中断的次数

proc.stat.processes.name: proc.stat.processes
proc.stat.processes.definition: 自系统启动以来所创建的任务的个数目

proc.stat.procs_blocked.name: proc.stat.procs_blocked
proc.stat.procs_blocked.definition: 当前被阻塞的任务的数目

proc.uptime.total.name: proc.uptime.total
proc.uptime.total.definition: 系统启动到现在的时间

proc.vmstat.pgfault.name: proc.vmstat.pgfault
proc.vmstat.pgfault.definition: Number of minor page faults (since the last boot)

proc.vmstat.pgmajfault.name: proc.vmstat.pgmajfault
proc.vmstat.pgmajfault.definition: Number of major page faults (since the last boot):

sys.numa.allocation.name: sys.numa.allocation
sys.numa.allocation.definition: Number of pages allocated locally or remotely for processes executing on this node

sys.numa.foreign_allocs.name: sys.numa.foreign_allocs
sys.numa.foreign_allocs.definition: Number of pages this node allocated because the preferred node didn't have a free page to accommodate the request.

sys.numa.interleave.name: sys.numa.interleave
sys.numa.interleave.definition: Number of pages allocated successfully by the interleave strategy

sys.numa.zoneallocs.name: sys.numa.zoneallocs
sys.numa.zoneallocs.definition: Number of pages allocated from the preferred node or not
